name: discussion needed
description: Need to wait until discussion is resolved

name: Type: Feature Request
description: For feature requests or modifications

name: Type: Bug
description: This is a confirmed or unconfirmed bug

name: Type: Documentation
description: Related to documentation

name: Type: Maintenance
description: Maintain OS upgrades and dependencies

name: Type: Question
description: Request for clarification

name: Priority: Critical
description: Act immediately

name: Priority: High
description: Needs to be addressed as soon as possible

name: Priority: Low
description: Can wait a bit longer

name: Priority: Medium
description: Normal priority

name: Status: In Review
description: Currently under review

name: Status: Needs Review
description: Waiting for available reviewer to pick up this issue or PR

name: Status: Abandoned
description: No progress for a long time. Is this still an issue?

name: Status: Available
description: Ready for pickup

name: Status: Blocked
description: Other work needs to be done first

name: Status: On Hold
description: We decided to not work on this for now. (e.g. until discussion is resolved)

name: Status: In Progress
description: Somebody is working on this

name: Status: Investigating
description: Somebody is looking into this, but the workload is not dispatched

name: author feedback requested
description: Waiting for feedback from original author

name: good first issue
description: Nice first issue to get familiar with this project

name: regression
description: Possibly breaks API interface. Needs further tests. Indicates a major version increase.

name: requires temporary solution
description: We need a quickfix for that

name: thank you :heart:
description: thank you ❤️

name: todo :spiral_notepad:
description: Todo found in code

name: wontfix
description: The issue will not be fixed or otherwise handled. When applied, the issue should be closed.
